Articles.Content:
So, I've been thinking about a mod that adds new flags, such as flags that are simply jokes and national flags. Would this be a good idea for a mod?

I've already tested a few using images on my computer.
You can already add custom flags to the game. You put them in a folder.

Yes, you can make flag packs. For example:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96484-0-90-ESA-Country-Flags-v1-2

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113399-Kerbalized-Flags-and-Space-Agencies

Or just release them as an imgur album: http://imgur.com/a/Ru5F2
